page.title: 05WHITECROSS
page.content: Whitecross is in the outskirts of Dunblane and originally consisted of a big house and a few cottages. Dunblane expanded and a number of private houses were built along the A9. Later a council house estate was built extending it to its present size. On the west side is the new cemetry where a number of boys and staff from the school are buried. There is also a sand quarry. It is here that about the last piece of single lane carriageway on the A9 exists and as a result there is a bottle neck which causes congestion. Traffic also tend to travel too fast down the dual carriageway and as a result several fatal accidents have occurred here.
